thread.title: Bath & Body Works to End On-Call Scheduling
thread.title_full: Bath & Body Works to End On-Call Scheduling - WSJ

author: Lauren Weber
title: Bath & Body Works to End On-Call Scheduling
text:
Bath & Body Works, which is owned by L Brands Inc., next month will end the controversial practice of on-call scheduling in its U.S. stores, the company said Tuesday.
Retailers using on-call scheduling require store employees to show up for work... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
